section1.title: 1. Purpose of donorHub
section1.content1: donorHub is a cryptocurrency-driven donation platform, enabling seamless support for charitable causes. Users can participate by purchasing tickets to join prize pools.
section1.content2: This document outlines the rules and regulations for using the donorHub platform.

section2.title: 2. User Responsibilities
section2.intro: As a user, you agree to follow these rules when using donorHub.
section2.item1: Provide accurate information when registering or donating.
section2.item2: Refrain from fraudulent activities or manipulating the system.
section2.item3: Respect the terms and conditions for participating in prize pools.
section2.conclusion: By adhering to these responsibilities, users ensure a fair and safe experience for all.

section3.title: 3. Account Management
section3.intro: Users are responsible for maintaining the security of their account and ensuring all login credentials are kept private.
section3.item1: Do not share your account information with others.
section3.item2: Notify donorHub immediately if you suspect any unauthorized activity.
section3.item3: Users must update their information regularly to ensure accuracy.
section3.conclusion: By keeping your account secure, you ensure a safe experience on donorHub.

section4.title: 4. Donations and Prize Pools
section4.intro: Donations made through donorHub contribute to various charitable causes. Users can enter prize pools by purchasing tickets with cryptocurrency.
section4.item2: Users can track their donation history within the platform.
section4.item3: Prize pools are drawn according to set schedules, and winners will be notified via email.
section4.conclusion: All transactions are handled securely and transparently.

section5.title: 5. Privacy Policy
section5.intro: donorHub respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This section outlines how your information is handled.
section5.item1: We collect personal data only for account management and donation purposes.
section5.item2: Your data is securely stored and encrypted.
section5.item3: We do not share your personal information with third parties unless required by law.
section5.conclusion: By using donorHub, you agree to our privacy policy and terms regarding your personal information.

section6.title: 6. Liability and Disclaimers
section6.intro: donorHub is not liable for any losses, damages, or technical issues users may experience while using the platform.
section6.item1: We do not guarantee the availability of the platform at all times.
section6.item2: We are not responsible for external links or third-party services.
section6.item3: Users engage with the platform at their own risk.
section6.conclusion: By using donorHub, you acknowledge and accept these terms regarding liability.

section7.title: 7. Termination of Service
section7.content: donorHub reserves the right to terminate any user's account if they violate these terms of service. Violations include, but are not limited to, fraudulent activities or abuse of the platform.

section8.title: 8. Contact Information
section8.content: If you have any questions or concerns regarding these terms, please contact us at contact@donorhub.site.

footer.text: For any inquiries or concerns, contact us at

privacy.pageTitleText: Please read this carefully and act accordingly.
privacy.introText: At DonorHub, we value your privacy and are committed to safeguarding any information related to your use of our platform.

dataCollection.title: 1. Data Collection
dataCollection.description: We do not collect any personal information from our users. All interactions on DonorHub are conducted anonymously and tied solely to Ethereum addresses.

useOfData.title: 2. Use of Data
useOfData.description: Any data collected is used strictly to improve platform functionality and ensure system security. This includes transaction details and usage analytics.

cookies.title: 3. Cookies
cookies.description: DonorHub uses minimal cookies to enhance user experience. These cookies do not store personal information and are used only for performance optimization.

security.title: 4. Security
security.description: We prioritize security by employing industry-standard practices to protect all transactions and data interactions within our platform.

changes.title: 5. Changes to This Policy
changes.description: This Privacy Policy may be updated periodically to reflect changes in our platform or compliance with legal requirements. Please review it regularly to stay informed.

privacy.footerText: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at
